Description:
Luxurious & Convenient Living!
Situated in the Highlands Estate is the perfect balance of space, style and convenience sure to impress all. This radiant three bedroom with no body corporate delivers smart low maintenance living with swift access to key lifestyle assets.
This remarkable residence features a functional floorplan inclusive of a spacious separate formal lounge, downstairs powder room, a sun soaked open plan living/meals area, kitchen area offering stainless steel appliances and Miele dishwasher. Adding to this comfortable floorplan is three generously sized bedrooms with built in robes, master equipped with walk in robe and oversized ensuite, glowing central bathroom with shower & separate bath.
Enhancing this property's indisputable appeal is ducted heating and split system cooling, electric roller shutters to all front facing windows, quality bamboo flooring, stylish light fittings, elegant ceiling to floor curtains in addition to the roller blinds, low maintenance backyard and double remote garage.
In a prime location close to all of Craigieburn's amenities, this property is surrounded by parks, within walking distance to Public Transport, Highlands-Stockland Shopping Centre, Mt Ridley College & Newbury Primary School. Be quick to inspect as this won't hang around for long.
Insights: 16 Parkforest Walk, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437
***SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437***Enjoy the fabulous family environs of this spacious family residence, enhanced by the quiet cul-de-sac exclusivity of a Fairways Estate address overlooking Craigieburn Golf Course, moments from Craigieburn Central shops and services. Generous front and rear living areas frame an inviting dining space and a Caesar-stone and stainless steel kitchen while a fitted study zone complements the exceptional family credentials. 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, featuring a separately zoned main bedroom with walk-in robes and dual vanity ensuite, contribute ideal accommodation to an intelligent, family friendly floor-plan on a corner allotment accompanied by alfresco elegance and low-maintenance outdoor surroundings. Central heating, split system cooling, separate laundry and a secure double garage are included in a comprehensive list of contemporary comforts.
My Agent Real Estate, a boutique agency offering a high level of service and innovative Real Estate practices to our clients right across Melbourne. Contact Adriano on 0402 055 437, or visit our web site www.myagentre.com.au where you can see all our listings and apply for our properties on line.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy on 677m2 (approx)
You will be the envy of all your friends with this stylish family home.
Offering a comfortable lifestyle of space and quality ideally located within close proximity to the train station, Hume Highway, local schools and shops. Just some of the features on hand include kitchen with S/S gas cooktop & oven, oversized meals/family area, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, formal lounge, master bedroom with walk in robe and full ensuite, double lock up garage with drive thru access, stunning decked alfresco area perfect for those who like to entertain all year round and much more.
All set on a very large allotment providing you with endless options as far as storage for the boat, caravan or trailer. This home really is the complete package. Don't let this opportunity pass you by. This one won't hang around for long. Call now for inspection

Description:
Prestige Home in a Prestigious Location
Picturesque, light filled and designed for modern day living, this much loved 4 Bedrooms plus Study, 34 Square family home will surely impress the fussiest of buyers. Built to highest of standard, this masterpiece spares no expense and with a custom designed layout gives enough room for a growing family.
Sitting on large 545 m2 of perfectly rectangular block, you will be impressed with its street presence and gorgeous façade with wide entrance. Step inside and be greeted by a wide Hallway, Study cum Office, stunning Master Bedroom with luxurious ensuite and Walk in robe, Formal lounge, dedicated Theatre room, indulging Central bathroom serving 3 other spacious bedrooms. The hub of house is the Gourmet Kitchen with walk in Butler Pantry, top of the range Stainless Steel appliances and Stone Benchtop, overlooking meals and family area leading to tiled Grand Alfresco and Outdoor entertainment for every occasion and low maintenance Backyard.
The Inclusions list is even better, consisting of Solar electricity, Ducted heating, Evaporative cooling, Video intercom, Alarm system, Security cameras, remote operated Double lock up garage, luxury window furnishing, low maintenance front and backyard plus so much more. Only a short walk to Hume tennis court, Aitkin creek primary, Hume library, Splash aquatic centre, Craigieburn central shopping and a short drive to Hume Anglican Grammar, Craigieburn Station and very easy access to Hume freeway.
An inspection is a must to fully appreciate the quality of this outstanding luxury home that will truly impress. Call now.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection

Description:
IMMACULATE TOWNHOUSE IN A CONVENIENT LOCATION
This stunning townhouse presents a fantastic opportunity for the astute investor, first home buyer or anyone looking for a relaxed no fuss easy lifestyle. Conveniently situated in a quiet pocket of Craigieburn and located close to Craigieburn Central, Craigieburn Junction, schools, Splash leisure aquatic center, lakes and park lands, this striking home is one you can simply not ignore.
A private front courtyard introduces you into a bright and spacious open plan living area arranged around the generous and light filled well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops and dining room.
Enter through the glass sliding doors to find a secure lock up carport and tranquil private paved courtyard perfect for summer entertaining or lazy afternoons. Upstairs comprises of two spacious bedrooms each with mirrored BIR, master with access to a relaxing balcony and centrally located modern bathroom with bath and separate toilet completed with a second living space/study.
Further features include ducted heated, remote access carport, 2 split systems, roller blinds and much more.
Insights: 4/8 Moresby Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Start or Perfect Investment...
Be quick to inspect this charming home offering gorgeous street appeal with loads of character and style. Well equipped with many upgrades to impress first home buyers or even the savviest of investors.
Showcasing 3 spacious bedrooms, master with private ensuite & built in robes. Additional 2 bedrooms also with built in robes, serviced by centralised stylish bathroom. Open-plan living/meals area in the heart of the home, grand kitchen with waterfall stone benchtop & stainless steel appliances with ample storage space. Step outside to the low maintenance backyard with the perfect entertaining zone for guests or the perfect area for the kids to play.
Additional features include the comforts of ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, single lock-up garage, double-glazed windows, storage shed and much more.
Suitably positioned in the heart of Craigieburn, within walking distance to public transport and only a short drive to reputable schools & Hume Library, local shops, Craigieburn Shopping Centre, Splash Aqua Park and much more. Inspection is a must!
Call us today!

Description:
Glamourous Family Living in Mt Ridley
Strikingly beautiful and luxurious in every sense, welcome to a refined sense of living with this exquisite family residence. Enjoyed and meticulously maintained, this beautifully presented family home home set in one of the area's most desirable pockets and ready to be loved by a new family.
Greeted by a spacious formal lounge, separate study, through to a large and well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, overlooking the meals/living zone with access to the outdoor entertaining area, and manicured front and back gardens.
The home is complete with solid timber flooring throughout, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, upstairs rumpus with balcony, master bedroom equipped with ensuite, walk in robe and balcony. In addition on offer are 3 extra oversized bedrooms with main central bathroom. Double garage featuring external glass sliding doors with internal access plus much more. Don't hold off inspecting this one!!

Description:
Spacious Family House in a Popular & Convenient Location
Closing Date Sale (Unless Sold Prior)
Monday 9st September 2019 at 2pm
This single-level home ideally situated in one of the area's most popular neighbourhoods - Highlands Estate, with just a short stroll to a local park, nearby schools, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre and every needed amenity at short distant drive. 
Comprising of 4 generously sized bedrooms with built-in robes, Master bedroom with Walk in Robe and Ensuite, a central bathroom and separate toilet, formal lounge, roomy laundry, the meals/ living area include a designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances open into an alfresco perfect for BBQ parties and low maintenence backyard giving your kids and pets plenty space to run around. Other features include Ducted Heating, Evaporative Cooling, a double remote garage with  internal & external access plus much much more. Perfect for a growing family!
Inspect with confidence and be quick to secure this wise opportunity.

Description:
Great First Home In A Great Location
Located within Newbury Primary school Zone. This well presented home is designed to accommodate a low maintenance lifestyle, add to their property portfolio or enter the market.
Situated within walking Distance to Newbury Primary School, Mount Ridley Secondary School, Hume Anglican Grammar, Highlands Hotel, Highland Shopping Centre, Age care facilities, Medical Centre, Public transport & child care facilities. Short drive to Craigieburn Central, Splash Aqua Park,
Craigieburn Train station and much more. Be quick to inspect as this one won't be on the market for long!
Features Included
• 3 Bedrooms with Built In Robes
• Master with walking robes and Ensuite
• Kitchen with S/S Appliances and Dishwasher
• Tilled Splash back
• Open Plan living and Dining
• Ducted Heating
• Split system Heating and Cooling
• Huge Undercover Decking area
• Coloured Concrete all around the house
• 5.94KW Solar system with 22 Panels
• Colourbond Fencing
• Lockup Remote Garage
Insights: 17 Viewside Crescent, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
INVESTMENT OR FIRST HOME GEM IN PRIME LOCATION
If you are looking to buy your first home or simply adding to your investment portfolio or downsizing, then look no further than this renovated low maintenance home centrally located close to several schools, transport, main Craigieburn shopping centres as well as other general living amenities.
Consisting of 3 excellent bedroom sizes all with BIR'S, formal lounge, kitchen with adjoining meals/family area, central renovated bathroom, roomy laundry and much more .

Description:
Brand New Quality Home !!
Turnkey Affordable home for a first home buyer in heart of Craigieburn. Save stamp duty and get the grant as well for this brand new property. Modern and spacious 4 bedrooms including master bedroom with WIR, 2 Bathrooms. Spacious family Living with meal area and double garage.
Features include:
Ducted heating and Evaporative cooling system.
Stone benchtop.
900 mm kitchen Appliance.
Timber look floors to entry, dining, kitchen, family rooms.
Stainless steel appliances.
Insulation to 6-star standard.
Choice of colours, tiles, fixtures, and fittings.
Colour bonds spouting, Pipes and Garage door.
Double garage with secure internal access.
Call Chetan Chauhan 0433 433 737 for further information.
Picture used for illustrative purposes only**
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
WORLD OF LUXURY!!
From the moment you enter this grand home, you will feel the WORLD OF LUXURY!
An impeccable block, surrounded by quality homes and neighbours. This well built and perfectly presented home featuring two levels of majestic living, comprising of four great size bedrooms, two with spacious walk-in robes and lavish en-suites, another two bedrooms with BIRs. A modest sized study, large upstairs retreat area for the whole family to enjoy. An open plan kitchen/dinning/living area with kitchen comprising of quality stone bench-tops, stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space. A luxurious second fully equipped kitchen for your own comfort on the second floor.
Also featuring a total of 3 living areas, a good size laundry, modern central bathroom and separate toilet. A resort style alfresco area including a fully equipped third kitchen to make for a grand living scheme, ideal for entertaining family and friends all year around.
Situated in the popular and quiet neighbourhood of Aston Estate. With a short distance to Public Transport, many parks, multiple Shopping Centres, high Educational Schools, Medical Centres, Sport Fields, Splash Aquatic and much more Craigieburn has to offer.
Property includes:
3 kitchens, 4 showers, 3 living rooms, 1 study, store room, combination of tiles and floor boards throughout the home, total of 136 down-lights, intercom audio visual, refrigerated cooling, ducted heating, stainless steel appliances, security system, ducted vacuum system, water fountain, glass splash backs, gas and electric stoves, double remote control garage and much much more.
Surely youll be impressed from first inspection!
Call Chawki Mallouk on 0413 370 414 or Nirmala Lama on 0451 469 332.
Insights: 27 Montvale Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
A Brand New Style of Living
Simply turn the key & move straight into this sparkling brand new Porter Davis built family home, with the peace of mind knowing everything has been done for you.
With its instant street appeal, this beautifully designed & spacious home will excite your senses with 4 bedrooms, ensuite with double vanities & walk-in robe to main, fully equipped kitchen with a large walk in pantry, overlooks a spacious open plan living with family & dining room, plus the added bonus of a separate living room, double remote garage with internal access & professionally landscaped gardens front & rear.
Featuring full turn-key inclusions & premium upgrades, including, roller blinds throughout, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, stone bench tops, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED down lights to entry & living areas, alarm, letterbox, clothesline, fencing & much more.
This amazing package is well located close to Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, local shops & suitable for families with primary school, Newbury Child & Community Centre & beautiful parks with walking tracks all close by. Don't miss out on this sensational offering, call today!

Description:
Bright Beauty-Brilliant Living
Enjoy the benefits of living in a central location close to schools, shops and public transport. Treat yourself to a great family home which offers generous living zones and a great presentation.
Step inside and you'll find 4 bedrooms, ensuite & WIR to main, central bathroom, sun filled lounge, fully equipped kitchen with adjoining meals offering optimum natural light and a spacious open plan living;
Extras include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, a garage with drive thru access to rear.
Carefully maintained and beautifully landscaped, this fabulous property is within close proximity to Craigieburn Golf Course, Craigieburn shopping centre, schools and transport (buses).
Key features include:
- Spacious open plan living/family area opening up to backyard
- Separate lounge room
- Well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher
- Four bedrooms, master with full en suite/walk in robe
- Built in robes to all other bedrooms serviced by a main bathroom
- Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
- Remote single garage with rear access
With everything neat, sweet and very complete, inspect with absolute confidence today.
Sealed Bid closing 30th September 2019 (unless sold prior)

Description:
Family Paradise!
Arriving at this property you will see the quality and attention to detail the minute you walk through the door. Located in the prestigious Aston Estate with a spacious floor plan, this beautifully maintained family home is an absolute standout.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 4 good size Bedrooms. Spacious Master Bedroom with WIR and Full Ensuite. Other 3 bedrooms with BIR serviced by Central Bathroom with Bath Tub.
- KITCHEN: Open Plan Living Kitchen with Walk-In Pantry, 900 mm Stainless Steel Appliances, 20 mm Caesar Stone Benchtops, Soft Close Drawers, Bosch Dishwasher and Double Fridge Space.
- HEATING/COOLING: Ducted Heating and Evaporative Cooling.
- LAUNDRY: Generous size laundry having access through Kitchen
- PARKING: Double Car Garage.
- BACKYARD: Generous sized low maintenance backyard and Decked Alfresco.
- LIVING AREAS: 2 living areas: Formal lounge & Family living area.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Wide Entry, High Ceilings, Downlights, Linen Cupboards, Low Maintenance Front yard, Tri stacker door added to Dining / Outdoor entertainment area, Walk in Linen and much more
- LOCATION: Within easy access to Public Transport, Beautiful Parklands, Craigieburn Road, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Child Care Centre, Schools, Splash Aqua Park, ANZAC Park, Restaurants/Café and much more
Please call now to book an inspection before you miss out on such a wonderful opportunity
Contact Eddi Bagdadi 0432 208 933

Comprising of formal lounge, kitchen/meals area, ducted heating & wall air conditioning, 2 bathrooms, huge backyard and an oversized garage perfect for storage of the boat/caravan or trailer. Ideally located in within walking distance to public transport, parkland, local shops and schools, don't let this opportunity pass you by. Currently rented out for $350.00 per week ($1517.00 per month). THIS ONE WON'T HANG AROUND FOR LONG!!

Description:
Family Home in Prime Location ....!!!
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this conveniently positioned house with close proximity to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Public Transport, Schools and parklands. Well equipped with all the bells and whistles to impress first home buyers or even the savviest of Investors.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 4 Spacious Bedrooms (Master Bedroom with Walk in Robe and Full Ensuite, other 2 Bedrooms with BIR, plus Study/ Potential 4th Bedroom and serviced by a central bathroom).
-KITCHEN: Spacious Open Plan Living/ Dining Kitchen with 900 mm Stainless Steel Appliances, stone benchtops, Electric Oven, Double Fridge Space, Picture Window, Ample cupboard space and pot drawers
- LIVING AREA: Open Plan Living and Formal Lounge.
- HEAT/COOL: Ducted Heating and Evaporative Cooling.
- LAUNDRY: Spacious Laundry with stone benchtops and ample cupboard space.
- PARKING: Single Car Garage with remote control access and an extra outer car space.
- BACKYARD: Low Maintenance Concrete Backyard
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Wide Entry, High Ceilings, Downlights, Quality laminated floor boards, Solar Panels, Linen Cupboards, European Blinds and much more....
- LOCATION: Walking distance to Royalden Park. Close proximity to Atkin Hill Primary School, Malcolm Creek Primary School, Willmott Primary School, Newbury Primary School, Aitken Creek Primary School, Our Lady's Primary School, Newbury Child and Community, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Junction, Craigieburn Golf Course Supermarkets, Gym, Traffic Park, Valcano Park, Splash Aqua Park Leisure Centre. Easy access to bus stops, beautiful parklands, Child Cares, Service Stations, Restaurants/CafÃ© and Hume Freeway.
If you're in the market for that perfect all round property, then look no further than this.
Don't miss out! Call Achal Arora - 0432 413 929.

Description:
Prestigious Family Living
Set in the most popular Estate in Craigieburn, everything you want is here! Attention to detail, overall quality and workmanship is what makes this brand new home a potential reality!
If you're a first home buyer looking for that something special or an astute buyer/investor wanting a home that's a cut above the rest, than look no further!
With a spacious entry/hallway, three accommodating bedrooms all with built in robes and master with walk in robe and ensuite. An open plan living area with a stunning kitchen featuring 900mm appliances, stone bench tops, adjoining meals area overlooking to your low maintenance rear yard is exactly what you all have been waiting for!
Some of the upgraded features include heating, cooling, high ceilings, study nook and much much more.
This is a rare opportunity dont miss out!
Call Eddi Bagdadi for more information
